preStep1: 1. Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Local' in the menu.
preStep2: 2. At this page either allow all, or allow just operation 0 'Transfer'.
preStep3: 3. Once at the local upload page, click the button below to proceed.
download1: 1. Your airdrop JSON has been generated, click the button to download it.
download2: 2. From the BEET Local page, upload the JSON file, a prompt should appear.
download3: 3. Verify the prompt's contents before approving the airdrop.

noDL.title: Via raw Beet deeplink
noDL.step1: Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Raw Link' in the menu.
noDL.step2: From this page you can either allow all operations, or solely allow operation 1 '' (then click save).
noDL.step3: Once 'Ready for raw links' shows in Beet submit this request.
noDL.label: Enter your account ID
